summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glueless Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Body Wave Body Wave Lace Front Wig Brazilian Hair 4x4 Closure Wigs Human Hair For Black Woman Bleached Knots Natural Hailine 20inch180 Density
Review Date: 2021/07/26
Store: SILKYFEEL
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'SILKYFEEL', 'Package Dimensions': '12.17 x 9.33 x 2.76 inches; 10.55 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:8cafd329a2c90832a936a0ec5b7cd041]] So I got this unit this week. The shipping is very fast!The item specs read- 20 inches, body wave 4x4 closure wig with 150%density. I am always very cautious when I read reviews. Though skeptical, but i still decided to take a chance on the 4x4, as opposed to the 13x4 body wave version. Both were similar with the only exception being 4x4 vs 13x4. At least 75% of the feeback and detailed reviews on the  13x4 unit were negative and less than stellar. So I was more than happy to stay clear of that version of the body wave unit.In contrast, the unit I received; I was able to tinker, manipulate, and try to customized it to my liking. Given my age, I am not the baby hair type, neither am I a stylist, just your average joe looking for a versatile unit.The Pros- I bleached the knots and it handled well. I was able to color the unit using Jet Black Tintation. The unit is also true to length, versatile, and beginner-friendly.The Cons- The unit seemed somewhat resistant to color, as I had to color twice. to obtain the dark color posted in my images. Conclusion- This is an entry-level body wave unit. If I am in a pinch, I would perhaps purchase it again. Especial at this special and hard time,ppl shouldn't wast money on bad quality hair. Our money and coins aren't mediocre, so we should never settle.
Review Title: Will Be Buying Again!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Faux Locs Crochet Hair - 18 Inch Soft Locs 7 Packs Pre Looped Crochet Hair New Faux Locs 21strands/Pack Crochet Hair for Black Women (18inch, 7packs, T30）
Review Date: 2022/03/07
Store: Aliyesy
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aliyesy', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Product Dimensions': '17.99 x 3.94 x 0.39 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '745551500004'}
Review Text: I decided to put these in my by myself and I'm glad I did. It was pretty easy plus Youtube university helped alot too. I never tried this color in my hair before but I wanted something different so I did. It is so cute with my skin tone. I feel so pretty. I will be doing this style again in the summer when I go on vacation. I also added some passion twist hair so it kinda looks like I have in butterfly locs. This is a must buy!!!
Review Title: So cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dosso Beauty Carbon Fiber Rat Tail Comb with Metal End for Styling (Pink)
Review Date: 2022/05/05
Store: Dosso Beauty
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Plastic, Carbon Fiber, Metal', 'Brand': 'Dosso Beauty', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '9.5 x 1 x 0.1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Dosso Beauty'}
Review Text: I have been wanting one of these combs for awhile but never got around to buying one. So I was excited to get this one. The tail and the teeth were not too sharp. It was very sturdy it was not made of cheap plastic. I use it for parting my part and it does a good precise job. Only con is that it is a bit more than I would normally pay for this type of comb.
Review Title: Great!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GLO to Go Teeth Whitening Pen — Easy to Use, Safe & Effective Dentist-Invented Whitening Treatment — Designed for Sensitive Teeth, Travel Friendly, Cinnamint Flavor
Review Date: 2022/07/04
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GLO Science', 'Product Benefits': 'Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.Natural plant-based ingredients help promote a clean and healthy smile and noticeably whiter teeth in 1 week.   See more', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Included Components': 'Teeth Whitening Pen', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 3 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28103305', 'UPC': '857181002510', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/RPTMQ'}
Review Text: I used the pen a couple times and I am yet to see any results. The flavor is horrible. I thought it was expired initially because it tasted so gross. Also it took me a while to get the gel to come out. After clicking about 20 times it finally cam out. Not worth it.
Review Title: Didn't work for me
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush
Review Date: 2022/08/16
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Review Text: It does the job. It detangles perfectly. It is thick and very good quality. It works great with my 4c hair. However, it still is not worth the price tag. You can get a similar quality comb for a fraction of the price.
Review Title: OK
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    SUMMARY:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual's purchase history reflects a preference for quality, versatile hair products, particularly those that are beginner-friendly and suitable for various styling needs. They consistently express sentiment towards products being easy to manipulate and customize, valuing practicality and craftsmanship, as observed from their positive feedback on wigs and crochet hair.

There’s a trend of selecting products that enhance personal appearance or provide convenience, with a notable inclination towards human hair and synthetic options. However, they exhibit caution in their purchases, highlighted by their hesitation regarding more expensive options and a strong aversion to poor quality, as evidenced by discontent with ineffective beauty products.

Quality is consistently prioritized, with a clear dissatisfaction toward overpriced items lacking performance, such as certain hair tools and teeth whitening products. While price sensitivity is present, the willingness to invest in quality is apparent, particularly when perceived value aligns with expectations. 

Overall, their core preferences center on affordability balanced with quality, robust functionality, and versatility in beauty products, alongside a desire for products that contribute to enhancing their personal style and confidence.

target_interaction.title: Not Natural
target_interaction.text: They did not look like the photos. They were very fluffy and did not look natural at all.
target_interaction.title_meta: MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs
features: 【FALSE EYELASHES NATURAL LOOK】-False lashes cat eye lash effect, Perfectly dispersed lengths,density and multi-layers for a more dimensional 3D effect.Faux mink lashes make your eyes bigger than usual,Vivid and shiny fake lashes,eye lash bright and attractive.
【FLEXIBLE & COMFORTABLE】-False eyelashes extensions D curl,easy to install,you can curl eye lashes and adjust the slim black band to meet the curvature of your eyes.

【ULTRA THIN BAND】-Lightweight false eyelashes cruely waterproof reusable,the band of eyelashes is pretty thin! Use non-irritant and hypoallergenic organic cotton band.Every pairs of fluffy lashes can be used about 10 times with proper care.

【PREMIUM QUALITY】-Milybest false lashes use high-tech volume process,100% handmade eye lash,focuses on the development of new models eyelashes,3D layered long lasting curl with no plastic feeling.Eyelashes are great as a Halloween Christmas gift.Definitely a great gift.
【MUST-HAVE FOR DAILY】-Lashes are a must-have cosmetic accessory for modern ladies.Eyelashes are great as a Halloween Christmas gift.Definitely a great gift.

videos.title: MilyBest Wispy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes
